ComicInfo.Summary:
After his fight with the dragon, Fafnir, Sigurd awakes to some troubling news. With a new threat on the horizon, Sigurd must team up with an uncertain ally to claim victory. But is this new villain truly the biggest threat, or is something even darker looming within Sigurd himself?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Ian Richardson & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Geebo Vigonte & Ivan Nunes | 3 | D | Cover D | Canaan White & Grostieta | 4 |
